page.title: 17A SCHOOLDAY
page.content: At 6.20 I woke to find my dog Sophie in the bed. I got up at 8.10 dressed, washed and had breakfast, cleaned my teeth and cycled to school. I had 25 minutes to play "it" with Jason my best friend. The person who is "it" catches the rest. School began with assembly for all children. At 9.20 we started reading. Maths followed until 10.40 then playtime till 11.00. From 11.00 to 12.05 we had English.We wrote an essay called "Life in Wartime". Dinner was next. In the dinner hour we played cricket. In this game you have a bat and a bowler throws the ball at three stumps in the ground. I have to hit the ball away. In the afternoon we had geography and two films about the Domesday Project. I went home at 3.30, watched T.V until 5.00, then had tea. I played with lego till 10.15 when I went to sleep.
